items.title: API Endpoint
items.summary: While I recommend our Chat Interface for Maximum compatibility, you also have access to an API Aggregation service that provides all Chat Model via an OpenAI compatible API endpoint. That means that any application that supports OpenAI API and allows setting a custom base URL…
items.content_html:
While I recommend our Chat Interface for Maximum compatibility, you also have access to an API Aggregation service that provides all Chat Model via an OpenAI compatible API endpoint.

That means that any application that supports OpenAI API and allows setting a custom base URL should be supported.

Your API key is available from the "Account" within "Settings".

Further documentation is available here;

API Documentation
